content:
Bummer about losing your favorite water bottle!

Let's add "New insulated water bottle" to your list.

What else might you need to pick up while you're at the store? Do you need to restock on any beverages or snacks to go with your new water bottle?

Here are a few suggestions to consider:

* Water or other drinks (e.g., juice, soda, coffee)
* Snacks (e.g., nuts, granola bars, trail mix)
* Other personal care items (e.g., toiletries, hair accessories)

Feel free to add or ignore these suggestions as you see fit!

What's next?
